mapper.sql: t_user.id as userId, t_user.phone as userPhone, t_user.email as userEmail, t_user_detail.nickname as userDetailNickname, t_user_detail.headicon as userDetailHeadicon, t_goods_order.id as goodsOrderId, t_goods_order.order_no as goodsOrderOrderNo, t_goods_order.total_amount as goodsOrderTotalAmount, t_goods_order.pay_amount as goodsOrderPayAmount, t_goods_order.discount_amount as goodsOrderDiscountAmount, t_goods_order.integral_amount as goodsOrderIntegralAmount, t_goods_order.express_fee as goodsOrderExpressFee, t_goods_order.order_status as goodsOrderOrderStatus, t_goods_order.pay_time as goodsOrderPayTime, t_goods_order.pay_type as goodsOrderPayType, t_goods_order.transaction_no as goodsOrderTransactionNo, t_goods_order.pay_success as goodsOrderPaySuccess, t_goods_order.deliver_time as goodsOrderDeliverTime, t_goods_order.deal_time as goodsOrderDealTime, t_goods_order_item.goods_id as goodsOrderItemGoodsId, t_goods_order_item.goods_sku_id as goodsOrderItemGoodsSkuId, t_goods_order_item.sku_title as goodsOrderItemSkuTitle, t_goods_order_item.sku_info as goodsOrderItemSkuInfo, t_goods_order_item.quantity as goodsOrderItemQuantity, t_goods_order_item.pay_amount as goodsOrderItemPayAmount, t_goods_order_item.discount_amount as goodsOrderItemDiscountAmount, t_goods_order_item.integral_amount as goodsOrderItemIntegralAmount, t_goods_pic.id as goodsPicId, t_goods_pic.pic_url as goodsPicPicUrl
mapper.select:
select
from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_item, t_goods_pic where t_user.id = #{id} and t_user.id = t_user_detail.id and t_goods_order.user_id = t_user.id and t_goods_order.id = t_goods_order_item.order_id and t_goods_order_item.sku_pic_id = t_goods_pic.id

select
from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_item, t_goods_pic where t_user.id = t_user_detail.id and t_goods_order.user_id = t_user.id and t_goods_order.id = t_goods_order_item.order_id and t_goods_order_item.sku_pic_id = t_goods_pic.id order by t_user.update_time desc, t_user.create_time desc

select
from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_item, t_goods_pic
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_user.update_time desc, t_user.create_time desc
select count(*) from t_user, t_user_detail, t_goods_order, t_goods_order_item, t_goods_pic
